name: Lazarus Session Highjacker
description: Detects executables launched outside their default directories as used by Lazarus Group (Bluenoroff)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:(*\\msdtc.exe OR *\\gpvc.exe) AND (NOT (process.executable:(C\:\\Windows\\System32\\* OR C\:\\Windows\\SysWOW64\\*))))`
